summary: This is an email from an Assistant U.S. Attorney in the Southern District of New York regarding the 'Epstein project', attaching documents including transcripts related to Ghislaine Maxwell and a supplement concerning perjury. It appears to be part of legal coordination or case preparation.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Her name appears in the filenames of attached transcripts from 2016, indicating she is a central subject of the documents being discussed.

events.title: Perjury Supplement Preparation
events.description: A document titled 'perjury_supplement' was created, likely related to legal proceedings.

events.title: Ghislaine Maxwell Transcript
events.description: A transcript related to Ghislaine Maxwell was created.

events.title: Ghislaine Maxwell Transcript
events.description: A second transcript related to Ghislaine Maxwell was created.

keyFacts: The email is from an Assistant U.S. Attorney in the Southern District of New York, indicating active federal prosecution involvement.
The subject line references the 'Epstein project', suggesting coordinated legal work on the case.
Attachments include a 'perjury_supplement' document and two transcripts of Ghislaine Maxwell from 2016.
The correspondence date is May 26, 2020, which is after Jeffrey Epstein's death but before Ghislaine Maxwell's arrest in July 2020.
